ygData.subject: Re: Collecting Bone Chips
ygData.msgSnippet: best spots In Feerrott in the NW corner is three sets of ruins with 10 spawn points with skeletons that spawn
ygData.messageBody:
<< Where do you go to collect your chips? >>

best spots

In Feerrott in the NW corner is three sets of ruins with 10 spawn points with
skeletons that spawn every 5 minutes. You can fill a back ack full of bones
in a short time.
If you want a little more adventure you can go into the back of spectre cave
in feerrott, right by the fear portal and do drybones and if your above lvl
40 you can take on cyndi a 40th lvl necro she spawns with dagger everytime
and great exp till 50.
Both spots are great for bones and hardly every camped. Well cyndi is
becomming popular so she might be.

In fayder you cant beat Unrest

In qeynos hills the ruins

My top picks
If your in freeport or Neriak and need em just buy from the players I only
pay 2-5 pp per stack depending on how bad I need them and usually only buy a
stack till i get to one of my spots.

Zakrell Lu'Dan
Tunare


Zakrell lu'dan
